channel.title: Jframes?

item.title: Jframes?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

im trying to add a jframe to my client but i can never get my client to load inside of it lols

well anyways heres what im starting out with

[code]
import javax.swing.JFrame;

public class Jframe extends JFrame {

public static void showJFrame(int i, int j)
{

	
    JFrame.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true);
    JFrame f = new JFrame("Shamon Scape Client");
    f.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
    f.setSize(i + 8, j + 28);
    f.setVisible(true);

}

}[/code]

Read full topic
